page.title: 17PEBMARSH ORGANISATIONS
page.content: There is a{play-group}for the 3 to 5's.Fifteen children go to the play-group which is held in the football club-house.Mrs.Crayston runs the group. The village hall has a{Management {Committee}which helps to organise village shows. The{Parish Council}has seven councillors and one clerk.It meets every six weeks in the village hall.They decide how some of the rates are to be spent on street lighting and grass cutting,for example.The council acts as a link with Braintree District Council. The{Parochial Church Council}deals with all church affairs. The{Countryman's Club}organises the Flower Show,the Autumn Show,talks and Senior Citizens' Parties. There is also a {Women's Institute.}
